projectGridLines.title: Customer Success Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Description: As a Customer Success Intern at BiteSpeed, you'll be expected to

manage a steady stream of customer queries, applying pre-set solutions from our

database to the issues. This role involves responding to a high volume of

inquiries, logging each interaction, and ensuring strict compliance with our

support guidelines. You'll track issues, forward tickets to other teams, and follow

up as needed. The position requires consistent documentation, long hours in the

CRM, and adherence to routine protocols. Ideal for someone comfortable with

predictable, steady work in a structured environment.

Skill sets: Solid experience with CRM systems: Comfort navigating complex CRM

tools to find data-driven solutions. High-Volume Workflow Optimization:

Proficiency in handling concurrent, high-volume ticket queues while maintaining

efficiency and adherence to service-level agreements (SLAs). Strong multitasking

and efficiency: Manage a high volume of inquiries without compromising on

quality or speed.

Traits expectation: Detail-Oriented, Analytical Mindset, Customer-Centric

Expected learning: Enhanced Documentation Skills: Gain hands-on experience in

creating and maintaining detailed, high-quality records that meet industry

standards. Process Adherence and Compliance: Understand the importance of

strict adherence to established protocols to maintain consistency and regulatory

compliance.

Specific courses required for project execution: ( EEE F416) Digital

Communication, (EEE F432) Medical Instrumentation, (EEE F435) Digital Image

Processing, (HSS F323) Organizational Psychology
